RTC exported constants

Defines

#define IS_RTC_SRC_LSE(x)   (x == RTC_SRC_LSE)
 Used to check RTC_SRC_Enum parameter.
#define IS_RTC_SRC(x)   ((x == RTC_SRC_LSI) || IS_RTC_SRC_LSE(x))
#define IS_RTC_LSESM(x)   ((x == RTC_LSESM_NORMAL) || (x == RTC_LSESM_FAST))
 Used to check RTC_LSESM_Enum parameter.
#define IS_RTC_PSC(x)
 Used to check RTC_RPRE_Enum parameter.
#define IS_RTC_ROAP(x)   ((x == RTC_ROAP_HIGH) || (x == RTC_ROAP_LOW))
 Used to check RTC_ROAP_Enum parameter.
#define IS_RTC_ROWM(x)   ((x == RTC_ROWM_PULSE) || (x == RTC_ROWM_LEVEL))
 Used to check RTC_ROWM_Enum parameter.
#define IS_RTC_ROES(x)   ((x == RTC_ROES_MATCH) || (x == RTC_ROES_SECOND))
 Used to check RTC_ROES_Enum parameter.
#define IS_RTC_WAKEUP(x)   ((((x) & (u32)0xFFFFF8FF) == 0x00) && ((x) != 0x00))
 Used to check RTC_WAKEUP parameter.
#define IS_RTC_INT(x)   ((((x) & (u32)0xFFFFFFF8) == 0x00) && ((x) != 0x00))
 Used to check RTC_INT parameter.
#define IS_RTC_FLAG(x)   ((((x) & (u32)0xFFFFFFF8) == 0x00) && ((x) != 0x00))
 Used to check RTC_FLAG parameter.
